receiver.title: Receiver
receiver.description: The party who will receive delivery of the goods defined in the invoice and is not responsible for taxes.

bill.Delivery.description: Delivery covers the details of the destination for the products described in the invoice body.

uuid.title: UUID
uuid.description: Unique document ID. Not required, but always recommended in addition to the Code.

code.title: Code
code.description: Sequential code used to identify this invoice in tax declarations.

type_code.title: Type Code
type_code.description: Functional type of the invoice, default is always 'commercial'.

rates.title: Exchange Rates
rates.description: Exchange rates to be used when converting the invoices monetary values into other currencies.

prices_include_tax.title: Prices Include Tax
prices_include_tax.description:
When true, implies that all item prices already include non-retained taxes. This is especially
useful for retailers where prices are often displayed including tax.

preceding.title: Preceding Reference
preceding.description: Key information regarding a previous invoice.

op_date.title: Operation Date
op_date.description: Date when the operation defined by the invoice became effective.

value_date.title: Value Date
value_date.description: When the taxes of this invoice become accountable, if none set, the issue date is used.

supplier.title: Supplier
supplier.description: The taxable entity supplying the goods or services.

customer.title: Customer
customer.description: Legal entity receiving the goods or services, may be empty in certain circumstances such as simplified invoices.

lines.title: Lines
lines.description: List of invoice lines representing each of the items sold to the customer.

outlays.title: Outlays
outlays.description: Expenses paid for by the supplier but invoiced directly to the customer.

totals.title: Totals
totals.description: Summary of all the invoice totals, including taxes.

notes.title: Notes
notes.description: Unstructured information that is relevant to the invoice, such as correction details.

meta.title: Meta
meta.description: Additional semi-structured data that doesn't fit into the body of the invoice.

bill.Invoice.description: Invoice represents a payment claim for goods or services supplied under conditions agreed between the supplier and the customer.

item.title: Item
item.description: Details about what is being sold

sum.title: Sum
sum.description: Result of quantity multiplied by the item's price

taxes.title: Taxes
taxes.description: List of taxes to be applied and used in the invoice totals

total.title: Total
total.description: Total line amount after applying discounts to the sum

bill.Line.description: Line is a single row in an invoice.

seller.title: Seller

bill.Ordering.description: Ordering allows additional order details to be appended

i.title: Index

ref.title: Reference

desc.title: Description
desc.description: Details on what the outlay was.

payer.title: Payer
payer.description: The party responsible for paying for the invoice

advances.title: Advances
advances.description: Any amounts that have been paid in advance and should be deducted from the amount due.

instructions.title: Instructions
instructions.description: Details on how payment should be made.

uuid.title: UUID

code.title: Code

outlays.title: Outlay Totals
outlays.description: Total paid in outlays that need to be reimbursed

payable.title: Payable
payable.description: Total amount to be paid after applying taxes

due.title: Due
due.description: How much actually needs to be paid now
